file_content.text: No, please! I'm an engineer! I was just supervising the carbonite weapon!
Please don't kill me! The informant didn't say you were some crazy super Jedi!
Who's been passing on information about me?
What informant?
I don't know! They never showed their face!
I won't hurt you, but I want to know what's going on.
It's alright. Just explain.
If you want to live, an explanation might calm me down.
I also have a short temper.
This anonymous tip said you'd "insulted" Captain Valon. The commandos planned to use you, to lure him out.
They needed you as bait, said they had to get back the armor Valon stole!
What's so special about Valon's armor?
"Armor"? Sounds important.
The Empire risked a whole squad of commandos over stolen property?
All this to catch a thief?
This armor's worth it.
Using a Jedi Master as bait? Typical Imperial arrogance.
That was a stupid plan.
They were getting desperate!
Hoth's covered in starship wreckage. We found advanced armor in a wreck and took it to our labs.
That armor has a special healing mechanism. It heals any wound. They just got it working when Valon stole it!
That's all I know, I swear! Can... can I go?
One more question: Will this armor keep Valon alive no matter what I do?
Can Valon be killed?
I don't know! They said Valon's invincible while he's wearing it!
Yes.
I'm never coming back to Hoth. I'm getting out if it... uhh....
I'm still bleeding. Please, great Jedi, could you heal me? I'll never make it to the landing pad like this.
I cannot leave anybody in pain. Here, this will help.
I never refuse one in need.
Yes. That's better. Thank you, Jedi. I'll never forget this.
This should help. Just be sure our paths never cross again.
Yes. Don't make me regret it.
They won't, I promise. Thank you. I should hurry before the snow closes in.
Your problem, not mine.
I--I understand. Maybe I'll meet one of our patrols out there. If I'm lucky.
I can't let you live with what you know.
No. You die. [Attack]
But--I helped you! Please, no!
